description:
Galcon is a must.  Conquer the Galaxy like never before!  Superb multi-touch interface.  Online realtime multiplayer.  A game MADE for the TouchPad.  

 Galcon Fusion is an awesome high-paced multi-player galactic arcade-strategy game. Send swarms of ships to defeat enemy planets and conquer the universe!

Winner of the 2009 Independent Game Festival Mobile Innovation in Mobile Game Design Award.

- Beautiful new HD graphics
- Multi-player, team games, and solo missions
- Achievements and detailed rankings
- 8 single player games including Stealth and Assassin
- Online games with up to 12 players
- Play against PC, Mac, and Linux users
